title._content: ["Philipland," Philip Laird house, 42 The Strand, New Castle, Delaware. (LOC)

description._content: Johnston, Frances Benjamin,, 1864-1952,, photographer. ["Philipland," Philip Laird house, 42 The Strand, New Castle, Delaware. Grape arbor] [1928 spring] 1 photograph : glass lantern slide, hand-colored ; 3.25 x 4 in. Notes: Site History. House Architecture: Federal house built for George Read Jr. in 1801. Landscape: Robert Buist for William Cooper, second owner, 1847, on three and half acres. Today: House and garden extant as the George Reed Jr. house, operated by the Delaware Historical Society. On slide (printed): "Edward Van Altena" and "71-79 W. 45th St., N.Y.C." Title, date, and subject information provided by Sam Watters, 2011. Forms part of: Garden and historic house lecture series in the Frances Benjamin Johnston Collection (Library of Congress). Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.16198 Call Number: LC-J717-X99- 40
